trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Boston
There were no other sightings in Boston on or around November 20th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving along the charles river on the cambridge side heading towards north cambridge with a friend when i saw out the corner of my eye a flash of white light when i looked to my left i saw a star like object with a tail swoop down into the atmosphere fly up alittle and pit stop in mid air over boston........ i looked at my friend and askd 1 question "did u just see that?" he startd goin crazy saying "oh my god yes i did". i had told him in june of this year that i had a dream of me and him seeing a ufo and i told him "you will see 1 with me before the year was over", him not beliveing in that kind of stuff before 2days ago said" i dont think so, what are the odds of that happining"... he surly swollowd those words lol...
